title: SUGGESTION ----- Adding a Customisable Favourites list in Champ Select
body:
Similar to the concept of item sets, it would be really cool to be able to _organise champs by role_ or your own particular skill set and see the organised list in _champ select_, because going in to champ select without a predetermined role/champ can be overwhelming if you own all the champs(and lets face it most regulars own all the champs). As a rough example, it could look as shown below.
**Top(Custom)**
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
**Mid(Custom)**
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
**Jungle(Custom)**
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
**ADC(Custom)**
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
**REST OF THE CHAMPS**
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

replies.body:
Just a few ways you can do this personally.

1. most lanes if you know you need to fit a certain role you can look up the class (Tank, Marksman, Assassin, Mage, Support, Fighter)
2. You can set up your own search lists in a Notepad or something, and copy them into league when you want this sort of feature, just split them all with a "|" and you will be able to list whatever you want (EG. For top, "Illaoi|Gnar|Irelia|Renekton")
Wow, I didn't know about this. Definitely gonna do it. Thanks!
You can just quick search the champ you want in the search box....

i know, but when you had a lane in mind but didnt get that lane and have to think of a champ to play on the spot, you may not end up with a champion you prefer. so many times im in loading screen and im like oh shit forgot about this champ could have played him/her

I can get behind this, however i'd rather opt into a kind of customizable hotlist/quickselect row, rather than having 5 seperate categories. So;

___________________________________________
**Quick Select**
Soraka, Singed, Vladaimir, Volibear, Skarner
___________________________________________

_Rest of Champions_
